spells.name: Aid
spells.description: Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's Hit Point maximum and current Hit Points increase by 5 for the duration.
spells.higher_levels: Each target's Hit Points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Alter Self
spells.description: You alter your physical form. Choose one of the following options: Aquatic Adaptation (gain gills and swimming), Change Appearance, or Natural Weapons (grow claws, fangs, horns, etc. that deal 1d6 + Str Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing).

spells.name: Arcane Lock

components.material: gold dust worth 25+ GP, which the spell consumes

spells.description: You touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway, and it becomes locked for the duration. You and the creatures you designate can open the object normally. You can also set a password.

spells.name: Barkskin
spells.description: You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target's skin takes on a bark-like appearance, and the target has an AC of 17 if its AC is lower than that.
spells.notes_2024: Barkskin is now a Bonus Action and lasts for 1 hour without Concentration.

spells.name: Blindness/Deafness
spells.description: One creature that you can see within range must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has the Blinded or Deafened condition (your choice) for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the spell on a success.
spells.higher_levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Blur
spells.description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it perceives you with Blindsight or Truesight.

spells.name: Branding Smite
spells.casting_time: Bonus Action, which you take immediately after hitting a creature
spells.description: The target of the triggering attack takes an extra 2d6 Radiant damage and sheds Dim Light in a 5-foot radius. The target can't benefit from the Invisible condition while it sheds this light.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Calm Emotions
spells.description: Each Humanoid in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, you can suppress the Charmed or Frightened condition on the creature, OR make the target Indifferent toward hostile creatures.

spells.name: Cloud of Daggers
spells.description: You fill the air with spinning daggers in a 5-foot Cube centered on a point you choose within range. A creature takes 4d4 Slashing damage when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 2d4 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Continual Flame

components.material: ruby dust worth 50+ GP, which the spell consumes

spells.description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch. The effect looks like a regular flame, but it creates no heat and doesn't use oxygen. A continual flame can be covered or hidden but not smothered or quenched.

spells.name: Cordon of Arrows
spells.description: You plant four pieces of nonmagical ammunition in the ground and lay magic upon them. When a creature other than you comes within 30 feet of the ammunition for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there, one piece of ammunition flies at it. The creature must succeed on a Dexterity save or take 2d4 Piercing damage.
spells.higher_levels: The amount of ammunition increases by two for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Crown of Madness
spells.description: One creature of your choice that you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Charmed condition for the duration. While Charmed, a twisted crown of iron appears on its head, and it must use its action before moving on each of its turns to make a melee attack against a creature other than itself that you mentally choose.

spells.name: Darkness

components.material: bat fur and a piece of coal

spells.description: Magical Darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius Sphere for the duration. Creatures with Darkvision can't see through this Darkness. Nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.description: You touch a willing creature to grant it Darkvision. For the duration, that creature has Darkvision to a range of 150 feet.

spells.name: Detect Thoughts
spells.description: You can read the thoughts of certain creatures. You can focus your mind on any one creature that you can see within 30 feet of you. If the creature you choose has an Intelligence of 3 or lower or doesn't speak any language, the creature is unaffected. You initially learn the surface thoughts of the creature.

spells.name: Enhance Ability

components.material: fur or a feather from a beast

spells.description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement. Choose one of the following effects; the target gains that effect until the spell ends: Bear's Endurance, Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendor, Fox's Cunning, or Owl's Wisdom.
spells.higher_levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Enlarge/Reduce
spells.description: For the duration, you cause a creature or an object you can see within range to grow larger or smaller. An unwilling creature can make a Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the spell has no effect. Enlarge doubles size in all dimensions, granting Advantage on Strength checks and saves, dealing +1d4 damage. Reduce halves dimensions, giving Disadvantage on Strength and -1d4 damage.

spells.name: Enthrall
spells.description: You weave a distracting string of words, causing creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear you to make a Wisdom saving throw. Any creature that can't be Charmed succeeds on this saving throw automatically. On a failed save, the target has Disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to perceive any creature other than you.

spells.name: Find Steed
spells.description: You summon an otherworldly being that appears in an unoccupied space within range. Choose its form: Camel, Donkey, Elk, Mastiff, Pony, or Warhorse. The creature serves as a mount for you and your allies. Your steed has Intelligence 6 and can understand one language you speak.

spells.name: Flame Blade
spells.description: You evoke a fiery blade in your free hand. The blade is similar in size and shape to a scimitar. On each of your turns as a Bonus Action, you can make a melee spell attack with the blade. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 Fire damage.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for every two slot levels above 2.

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space within range. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 feet of the sphere makes a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 Fire damage on a failed save or half as much on a success. As a Bonus Action, you can move the sphere up to 30 feet.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Gentle Repose

components.material: 2 copper pieces, which the spell consumes

spells.description: You touch a corpse or other remains. For the duration, the target is protected from decay and can't become Undead. The spell also extends the time limit on raising the target from the dead.

spells.name: Gust of Wind
spells.description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose. Each creature in the line must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from you in a direction following the line. Any creature in the line must spend 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot it moves when moving closer to you.

spells.name: Heat Metal

components.material: a piece of iron and a flame

spells.description: Choose a manufactured metal object that you can see within range. You cause the object to glow red-hot. Any creature in physical contact with the object takes 2d8 Fire damage. Until the spell ends, as a Bonus Action you can cause the damage again. If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.description: Choose a Humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or have the Paralyzed condition for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target makes another Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the spell ends on the target.
spells.higher_levels: You can target one additional Humanoid for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: A creature you touch has the Invisible condition until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends on a target that makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.
spells.higher_levels: You can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Knock
spells.description: Choose an object that you can see within range. The object can be a door, a box, a chest, a set of manacles, a padlock, or another object that contains a mundane or magical means that prevents access. A target that is held shut by a mundane lock or that is stuck or barred becomes unlocked, unstuck, or unbarred. If the object has multiple locks, only one of them is unlocked.

spells.name: Lesser Restoration
spells.description: You touch a creature and end one condition on it: Blinded, Deafened, Paralyzed, or Poisoned.
spells.notes_2024: Lesser Restoration is now a Bonus Action.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically up to 20 feet and remains suspended there for the duration. You can change the altitude by up to 20 feet in either direction on your turn. An unwilling creature that succeeds on a Constitution saving throw is unaffected.

spells.name: Locate Animals or Plants
spells.description: Describe or name a specific kind of Beast or plant. Concentrating on the voice of nature in your surroundings, you learn the direction and distance to the closest creature or plant of that kind within 5 miles, if any are present.

spells.name: Locate Object
spells.description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

spells.name: Magic Mouth

components.material: jade dust worth 10+ GP, which the spell consumes

spells.description: You implant a message within an object, which is uttered when a trigger condition is met. Choose an object that you can see. You then speak the message, which must be 25 words or less, and determine the trigger condition.

spells.name: Magic Weapon
spells.description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls. The bonus increases when you reach certain levels: +2 at level 10, +3 at level 14.
spells.notes_2024: Magic Weapon no longer requires Concentration and scales with character level.

spells.name: Melf's Acid Arrow
spells.description: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d4 Acid damage immediately and 2d4 Acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow splashes the target with acid for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.
spells.higher_levels: Both damage rolls increase by 1d4 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Until the spell ends, the duplicates move with you and mimic your actions. Each time a creature targets you with an attack roll, roll a d6 to determine whether the attack instead targets one of your duplicates.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

spells.name: Moonbeam
spells.description: A silvery beam of pale light shines down in a 5-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range. Until the spell ends, Dim Light fills the Cylinder. When a creature enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it is engulfed in ghostly flames, taking 2d10 Radiant damage.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Pass without Trace

components.material: ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe

spells.description: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, each creature you choose within a 30-foot Emanation has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means.

spells.name: Phantasmal Force
spells.description: You craft an illusion and implant it in the mind of a creature that you can see within range. The target makes an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, you create a phantasmal object, creature, or other visible phenomenon in the target's mind. The phantasm includes sound, temperature, and other sensory stimuli. The target takes 1d6 Psychic damage at the end of each of its turns while the spell persists.

spells.name: Prayer of Healing
spells.description: Up to five creatures of your choice within range each regain Hit Points equal to 2d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
spells.higher_levels: The healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Protection from Poison
spells.description: You touch a creature. If the creature is Poisoned, you neutralize the poison. If more than one poison afflicts the target, you neutralize one poison that you know is present. For the duration, the target has Advantage on saving throws against the Poisoned condition and Resistance to Poison damage.

spells.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
spells.description: A ray of enervating energy lances toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength until the spell ends. At the end of each of the target's turns, it makes a Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the spell ends.

spells.name: Rope Trick

components.material: powdered corn extract and a twisted loop of parchment

spells.description: You touch a length of rope that is up to 60 feet long. One end of the rope rises into the air until the whole rope hangs perpendicular to the ground. At the upper end of the rope, an invisible entrance opens to an extradimensional space that lasts until the spell ends. Up to eight Medium or smaller creatures can be in the space.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range. You can hurl them at one target or several. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 Fire damage.
spells.higher_levels: You create one additional ray for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: See Invisibility
spells.description: For the duration, you see creatures and objects that have the Invisible condition as if they were visible, and you can see into the Ethereal Plane.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw, taking 3d8 Thunder damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. A creature made of inorganic material has Disadvantage on this saving throw.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2.

spells.name: Silence
spells.description: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the Sphere has Immunity to Thunder damage, and creatures are Deafened while entirely inside it. Casting a spell that includes a verbal component is impossible there.

spells.name: Spider Climb

components.material: a drop of bitumen and a spider

spells.description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free. The target also gains a Climb Speed equal to its Speed.

spells.name: Spike Growth
spells.description: The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range twists and sprouts hard spikes and thorns. The area becomes Difficult Terrain. When a creature moves into or within the area, it takes 2d4 Piercing damage for every 5 feet it travels. The transformation of the ground is camouflaged to look natural.

spells.name: Spiritual Weapon
spells.description: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier Force damage. As a Bonus Action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack.
spells.higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above 2.
spells.notes_2024: Spiritual Weapon now deals Force damage and requires Concentration.

spells.name: Suggestion
spells.description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. The suggestion must sound achievable and not involve something obviously harmful. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or pursue the suggested activity.

spells.name: Warding Bond

components.material: a pair of platinum rings worth 50+ GP each, which you and the target must wear for the duration

spells.description: This spell wards a willing creature you touch and creates a mystic connection between you and the target until the spell ends. While the target is within 60 feet of you, it gains a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws, and it has Resistance to all damage. Also, each time it takes damage, you take the same amount of damage.

spells.name: Web
spells.description: You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point of your choice within range. The webs fill a 20-foot Cube from that point for the duration. The webs are Difficult Terrain and lightly obscure their area. If the webs aren't anchored between two solid masses, they collapse. Each creature that starts its turn in the webs or enters them must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have the Restrained condition while in the webs.

spells.name: Zone of Truth
spells.description: You create a magical zone that guards against deception in a 15-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point of your choice within range. Until the spell ends, a creature that enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't speak a deliberate lie while in the radius. You know whether a creature succeeds or fails on its saving throw.
